reviews.review_text: The plot lacked depth, and the characters felt underdeveloped. I couldn't stay engaged.
A decent watch with a few standout moments, but the pacing could have been better.
An absolute masterpiece! The cinematography and storytelling were stunning.
A captivating journey from start to finish. Highly recommended for any movie lover.
The emotional depth and compelling narrative make this a must-watch.
A solid film with great acting performances, though the ending felt a bit rushed.

The visuals were breathtaking, but the plot could have used more originality.
Easily one of the worst movies I've seen. The dialogue was cringe-worthy.

Not my cup of tea, though I can see how others might enjoy it.
